item.title: Npc dialogue delta
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

im trying to make a quest so i added this code

case 124: talk("Can you help me bake a cake please?", 1597); break; case 125: choice("Yes.", "No."); break; case 126: talk("Great, i give you a ingredient list.", 1597); } }
i made it work with cook
but when i talk to the cook he says
Can you help me bake a cake please?
and when i click continue it does nothing
how do i make it go to case 125 afterwards?

Read full topic
